channel.title: How to change item names. (317 , Delta)
channel.description:
i know it sound noob xD its late and i am tired.
please tell me how to change a item name!.
Well thank you Delta , 317.
Youridudock

item.title: How to change item names. (317 , Delta)
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“rova1, post:2, topic:372158”]class8.java in your client folder (for custom items) - this is for the name of the item when you hover over it with mouse or right-click it

for the name of the item in chatbox or 2nd trade screen it is server side item.cfg[/quote]

thank you. i knew it but i forgot were it was

Read full topic
item.source: How to change item names. (317 , Delta)

item.title: How to change item names. (317 , Delta)

for the name of the item in chatbox or 2nd trade screen it is server side item.cfg
